attributes.action: Eliminate the 2021 GCSE and A level mocks, receiving 1 grade above predictions.
attributes.additional_details: They should be cancelled as the reasons for which the real exams were cancelled also apply for the mocks, therefor grading or having the exams would be unjust as they would also have to take place online where some students would be cheat, making people who had been consistently studying not appear to perform aswell.
attributes.background: We want Parliament to eliminate the GCSE,IGCSE and A level mock exams as it would be incoherent and disabilitating to have them for students since the real exams have been cancelled for specific reasons.

rejection.details: Deciding whether to hold mock exams is a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.
